top_stories.title: Sole Source Capital Acquires Brite, a Cybersecurity & MSP
top_stories.description: Transaction Represents SSC’s First Platform Investment from SSC Partners Fund III Sole Source Capital LLC, an industrial and business services-focused private equity firm, today announced that it has acquired Brite, a leading cybersecurity and managed services provider serving customers across the U.S. This transaction marks Sole Source’s first platform investment... The post Sole Source Capital Acquires Brite, a Cybersecurity & MSP first appeared on AI-Tech Park.
top_stories.author: Business Wire
top_stories.content: Transaction Represents SSC’s First Platform Investment from SSC Partners Fund III Sole Source Capital LLC, an industrial and business services-focused private equity firm, today announced that it has acquired Brite, a leading cybersecurity and managed services provider serving customers across the U.S. This transaction marks Sole Source’s first platform investment... top_stories.title: Musk vows to open source X algorithm in 7 days amid EU scrutiny
top_stories.description: Elon Musk announced on X that the platform will open source its new recommendation algorithm, including all code for organic and advertising post recommendations, in seven days. Musk made the statement on Saturday via a post on X, the social media platform formerly known as Twitter, which he acquired in 2022. The algorithm determines the […]

top_stories.title: Certification scheme for the UK digital identity and attributes trust framework
top_stories.description: Conformity assessment bodies must follow these processes and requirements when certifying services against the UK digital identity and attributes trust framework.
top_stories.content: Conformity assessment bodies must follow these processes and requirements when certifying services against the UK digital identity and attributes trust framework.

top_stories.title: NVIDIA Expands Global DRIVE Hyperion Ecosystem to Accelerate the Road to Full Autonomy
top_stories.description: At the CES trade show running this week in Las Vegas, NVIDIA announced that the global DRIVE Hyperion ecosystem is expanding to include tier 1 suppliers, automotive integrators and sensor partners, including Aeva, AUMOVIO, Astemo, Arbe, Bosch, Hesai, Magna, Omnivision, Quanta, Sony and ZF Group. This builds on collaborations unveiled at NVIDIA GTC Washington, D.C., Read Article
top_stories.author: Mo Poorsartep

top_stories.title: How Omada Health scaled patient care by fine-tuning Llama models on Amazon SageMaker AI
top_stories.description: This post is co-written with Sunaina Kavi, AI/ML Product Manager at Omada Health. Omada Health, a longtime innovator in virtual healthcare delivery, launched a new nutrition experience in 2025, featuring OmadaSpark, an AI agent trained with robust clinical input that delivers real-time motivational interviewing and nutrition education. It was built on AWS. OmadaSpark was designed […]
